dcterms:creator: R. Isaacs
dcterms:description: The game of two cars, where the pursuer is considered superior to the evader, characterized by backward integration of Issacs equation for the game in reduced state-space.
dcterms:title: Game of Two Cars

dcterms:creator: A. W. Merz
dcterms:description: The game of two identical cars, where the evader and the pursuer have equal speed and the pursuer is more agile than the evader.
dcterms:title: The Game of Two Identical Cars

dcterms:creator: I. Exarchos
P. Tsiotras
dcterms:description: An asymmetric version of the two car pursuit-evasion game.
dcterms:title: An Asymmetric Version of the Two Car Pursuit-Evasion Game

dcterms:creator: R. Bera
V. R. Makkapati
M. Kothari
dcterms:description: A comprehensive differential game theoretic solution to a game of two cars, covering various cases of pursuer and evader dynamics.
dcterms:title: A Comprehensive Differential Game Theoretic Solution to a Game of Two Cars

dcterms:creator: I. Exarchos
P. Tsiotras
M. Pachter
dcterms:description: On the suicidal pedestrian differential game, analyzing the dynamics of a pedestrian in a pursuit-evasion context.
dcterms:title: On the Suicidal Pedestrian Differential Game

dcterms:creator: U. Ruiz
R. Murrieta-Cid
dcterms:description: A differential pursuit/evasion game of capture between an omnidirectional agent and a differential drive robot.
dcterms:title: A Differential Pursuit/Evasion Game of Capture Between an Omnidirectional Agent and a Differential Drive Robot

dcterms:creator: U. Ruiz
R. Murrieta-Cid
J. L. Marroquin
dcterms:description: Time-optimal motion strategies for capturing an omnidirectional evader using a differential drive robot.
dcterms:title: Time-Optimal Motion Strategies for Capturing an Omnidirectional Evader Using a Differential Drive Robot

dcterms:creator: E. Cockayne
dcterms:description: Plane pursuit with curvature constraints, analyzing the dynamics of pursuit in a planar context.
dcterms:title: Plane Pursuit with Curvature Constraints

dcterms:creator: K. Mizukami
K. Eguchi
dcterms:description: A geometrical approach to problems of pursuit-evasion games.
dcterms:title: A Geometrical Approach to Problems of Pursuit-Evasion Games

dcterms:creator: E. Cockayne
G. Hall
dcterms:description: Plane motion of a particle subject to curvature constraints.
dcterms:title: Plane Motion of a Particle Subject to Curvature Constraints

dcterms:creator: X.-N. Bui
J.-D. Boissonnat
dcterms:description: Accessibility region for a car that only moves forwards along optimal paths.
dcterms:title: Accessibility Region for a Car that Only Moves Forwards Along Optimal Paths

dcterms:creator: L. E. Dubins
dcterms:description: On curves of minimal length with a constraint on average curvature, and with prescribed initial and terminal positions and tangents.
dcterms:title: On Curves of Minimal Length with a Constraint on Average Curvature
